bio: Jibanyan in a special suit for Terror Time! He soon forgets his lazy ways once he puts on this gear!

soultimate.name: Meow Meow Blaster
soultimate.description: Fires the blaster, dealing heavy damage to foes.

skill.effect: Increases the power of X button moves by 40%.
skill.name: The X-Factor

name: Jibanyan B
